column1: Meesho Product Uploading
Add data to this Excel sheet for quick uploads

2 types of fields in the top row: Compulsory Fields, Recommended Fields
Compulsory Fields are values necessary to create your product. Missing (Blank Cells) or incorrect values in a mandatory field will lead to rejection of the listing
Recommended Fields give customers important information they need to make an informed purchase decision. Missing values (Blank Cells) make it difficult for customers to find your listing
Key Guidelines
column3:
• Some cells have fixed valid values. You must only select a value from the drop-down menu in  such cells
• Check the validation sheet to see what values are valid for each column
• If you wish to create multiple variants for your products, there would be a new row for each one (Each size, each colour in a separate row)

column1: Points to check before uploading the sheet

☑ All the manadatory fields should be correctly filled
☑ Both Meesho Price & Wrong/Defective Returns Price should be less than MRP. Wrong/Defective Returns Price should be lower than Meesho Price.
☑ Image link should be working and Images should be mapped correctly with products
☑ Content should not have grammatical errors or spelling mistakes
☑ Restricted Keywords should not be used (e.g. smoking, other portal names, violent slogans)
Image criteria
You must provide minimum 1 front image for each SKUs
Image standards
Solo product image without any props.
Product image should not have any text
Following Images will be rejected
Graphic/ Inverted/ Pixelated image are not accepted.
Images with text/Watermark are not acceptable in primary images.
Blur images and clutter images are not accepted.
Images should not contain price/brand logo for the product.
Product images must not be shrunk, elongated or stretched.
Partial product image is not allowed.
Offensive/Objectionable images/products are not acceptable.
Image format
We only accept .JPEG images. Any other format is not accepted
We accept Images only in RGB color space . We don’t accept images in CMYK or any other color space
Uploading & providing image
Please use the image uploader on the supplier panel to generate image link. We do not support google drive links. Click on below video link to learn more
How to create Image link
